Get the user-setting for a style.
style
The style.
The user-setting, orNULL.
Get the value of a preference in ~/.gntrc.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the group in the keyfile. IfNULL, the prgname will be used first, if available. Otherwise, "general" will be used.

simplesect.para: The value of the setting as a string, or NULL

detaileddescription.para: Get the value of a color pair in ~/.gntrc.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the group in the keyfile. IfNULL, the prgname will be used first, if available. Otherwise, "general" will be used.

simplesect.para: The value of the color as an int, or 0 on error.

detaileddescription.para: Get the value of a preference in ~/.gntrc.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the group in the keyfile. IfNULL, the prgname will be used first, if available. Otherwise, "general" will be used.
Return location for the number of strings returned, or NULL

simplesect.para: NULL terminated string array. The array should be freed with g_strfreev().

detaileddescription.para: Get the boolean value for a user-setting.

parameterdescription.para: The default value (i.e, the value if the user didn't define any value)

detaileddescription.para: Parse a boolean preference. For example, if 'value' is "false" (ignoring case) or "0", the return value will beFALSE, otherwiseTRUE.

parameterdescription.para: The value of the boolean setting as a string
The hastable to store the accel information.

simplesect.para: TRUE if some accels were read, FALSE otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The filename to read configuration from.
